name: Scandia Ardeo 7 Stove
descr: The Ardeo VII (7kW) stove is the largest in the Ardeo range, forged in traditional cast iron with a distinct touch of contemporary styling this 7kW stove will effectively heat living spaces up to 98 cubic metres. It is Defra and HETAS approved for use in Smoke Control Areas. This stove has a firebrick lined firebox, a removable ash pan for ease of maintenance, premium impact resistant glass as well as a "clearview" glass airwash system.

name: Yale Standard Euro Double Cylinder - 30:10:30 (70mm) - Nickel Finish

name: Scandia Exuro 5 Stove
descr: The Exuro V (5kW) stove is a contemporary design with extended viewing glass that retains the focal point of the room while minimalist controls both above and within the lower door provide the primary and secondary air controls to enable complete and effective control over both burn rate and temperature output. Defra and HETAS approved for use in Smoke Control Areas. This stove has a firebrick lined firebox, a removable ash pan for ease of maintenance, premium impact resistant glass as well as a "clearview" glass airwash system.

name: Dimplex Chevalier 2kW Electric Stove
descr: The Dimplex Chevalier is an authentic, cast iron styled electric stove, an ideal alternative to traditional wood burning/solid fuel stove. Adding to the stove authenticity, the Chevalier uses Optiflame technology creating a realistic flame effect which can be operated with or without heat, making it ideal for use all year round. Completing the look, the Chevalier has opening doors finishing off its realistic appearance. Electric fires are easy to operate as there is little or no installation required.

name: Dimplex Castillo Electric Freestanding Fire - 2kW
descr: The Dimplex 2 kW Castillo freestanding electric fire is designed to be used freestanding flat against a wall. It is supplied assembled so it is very easy to set up. The Castillo has an elegant and contemporary look, finished in satin silver with chrome effect fret and trims. The fire has a choice of 2 heat settings (1 kW or 2 kW) for a greater control over your room temperature, and comes with a choice of a real coal or white pebble fuel bed, both of which are included.

name: Adam Orlando Electric Suite
descr: Add a warm and welcoming glow to your living space with this contemporary Adam Orlando Electric Suite. name: Dimplex Pemberley 2kW Opti-myst Electric Wall Fire

A realistic coal bed with smouldering embers and dancing flames delivers an outstanding performance. Teamed with the accompanying heavenly warmth the Glenmore is the perfect addition to your home.

A detachable water tank and a low water alarm. Adjustable humidification level and oscillating louver. A top loading ice compartment.

name: Kincrome Imperial Combination Gear Spanner 7 Piece
descr: The Kincrome Gear Spanner has all the benefits of standard spanners and more. With 72 teeth, the strong fine gear ratcheting ring end needs as little as 5° of sweep to move fastener, a standard fixed ring end needs a minimum of 30°, or 6 times the area. Kincrome Gear Spanner ratcheting ring end has a Peripheral Drive configuration that virtually eliminates the rounding off of fasteners. The narrow and thin head, combined with fine gear tooth design makes the Kincrome Gear Spanner suitable for working in tight and hard to access areas where a ratchet and socket will not fit. Combined with the 'Fine Tooth' technology Kincrome Gear Spanners are the 'state of the art' in spanners, and come with a handy plastic storage case.

name: Kincrome Metric Flex Head Gear Spanner Set 7 Piece
descr: The Kincrome gear spanner has all the benefits of standard spanners and more. The strong fine gear ratcheting ring end needs as little as 5 inches of sweep to fasten, a standard fixed ring end needs a minimum of 30 or 6 times the area. Kincrome gear spanner ratcheting ring end has a Peripheral Drive configuration that virtually eliminates the rounding off of fasteners. The narrow and thin head, combined with fine gear tooth design makes the Kincrome gear spanner suitable for working in tight and hard to access areas where a ratchet and socket will not fit. Combined with the 'Fine Tooth' technology Kincrome gear spanners are the 'state of the art' in spanners, and come with a handy plastic storage case.

descr: The Josco Brumby 5 piece Wire Brush Kit offers a comprehensive range of wire brushes for drills. All fitted with a spindle, they can be directly mounted onto your drill. This type of wire, not to be confused with brass wire, is suitable for use on steel, brass, iron, plastics and wood.

name: Wheel Flap Set 3 Pack
descr: The Josco 3 Piece Flap Wheel Kit consists of various sizes of 60 Grit flap wheels to suit your project needs. Josco's Flap Wheels offers a quick and economical solution to working on both flat and contoured surfaces. Constructed with a flat top and bottom, this particular design of flap wheel allows for more versatility of application compared to a �raised hub� version. Josco Flap Wheels are manufactured using the highest quality industrial cloth. As the flaps wear down, new abrasive is continuously exposed. This action prevents clogging and gives a uniform, constant finish throughout the life of the wheel. To obtain the best performance from your the Josco Flap Wheel use only light pressure so that only the tips of the flaps are in contact with your work piece.

It has an excellent ergonomic design with a soft grip and front handle to allow you to relax when working. The 3 LED battery status indicator keeps you aware of how much battery you have left during the job.  This product is part of the Bosch 18V PowerForAll system of interchangeable batteries. All you need to start your Bosch kit is one charger and a 18V lithium-ion battery which fits all 18V li-ion DIY garden and power tools or buy additional for flexibility.
